# Combat Prescience, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Divination Spells|Divination]]

**Level:** [[6th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 6]], [[6th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 6]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 12th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 12]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 hour/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** The Mageâ€™s Tower website

You gain an intuitive sense of your surroundings, allowing you to dodge attacks and evade enemies with supernatural awareness. You Iiterally see attacks coming before your opponents commit to them. You gain a +4 dodge bonus to AC and cannot be flanked for the duration of this spell, Furthermore, if you must make an initiative check while this spell is in effect, you gain a +4 competence bonus to that check.
